species: Search wildlife data by species. Note that, depending on the species, it may take a while to retrieve and display all data.
genus: Search wildlife data by genus. Note that, depending on the genus, it may take a while to retrieve and display all data.
family: Search wildlife data by taxonomic family. Note that, depending on the family, it may take a while to retrieve and display all data.
order: Search wildlife data by taxonomic order. Note that, depending on the order, it may take a while to retrieve and display all data.
class: Search wildlife data by taxonomic class. Note that, depending on the class, it may take a while to retrieve and display all data.
stateSelect: Select states for which to return wildlife data. If you have selected individual sampling locations that are not in the specified states, those results will still be included.
countySelect: Select counties for which to return wildlife data. If you have selected individual sampling locations that are not in the specified counties, those results will still be included.
siteSelect: Select sampling locations for which to return wildlife data. If you have also selected states, the search will also return data for all locations in those states.
timeRange: Time range for which to return wildlife data. NOTE that you must select a month before you can select a day.
coordRange: Look for wildlife data within a specified coordinate range.
datasetSelect: Search for wildlife data within specific datasets.
